activities.name: Reference Entity Code Map to SQL

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT '@{pipeline().DataFactory}' as DataFactoryName,
'@{pipeline().Pipeline}' as PipelineName,
'@{pipeline().RunId}' as RunID,
'@{item().SrcStoredProcedure}' as Source,
'@{item().DestEntity}' as Destination,
'@{pipeline().TriggerType}' as TriggerType,
'@{pipeline().TriggerId}' as TriggerID,
'@{pipeline().TriggerName}' as TriggerName,
'@{pipeline().TriggerTime}' as TriggerTime,
'@{activity('Transformed to Destination').output.rowsCopied}' as RowsCopied,
'@{activity('Transformed to Destination').output.rowsRead}' as RowsRead,
'@{activity('Transformed to Destination').output.usedParallelCopies}' as ParallelCopies,
'@{activity('Transformed to Destination').output.copyDuration}' as CopyDuration_SS,
'@{activity('Transformed to Destination').output.effectiveIntegrationRuntime}' as EffectiveIntegrationRuntime,
'@{activity('Transformed to Destination').output.executionDetails[0].source.type}' as SourceType,
'@{activity('Transformed to Destination').output.executionDetails[0].sink.type}' as SinkType,
'@{activity('Transformed to Destination').output.executionDetails[0].status}' as ExecutionStatus,
'@{activity('Transformed to Destination').output.executionDetails[0].start}' as CopyActivity_StartTime,
'@{utcnow()}' as CopyActivity_EndTime,
'@{activity('Transformed to Destination').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.queuingDuration}' as CopyActivity_QueuingDuration_SS,
'@{activity('Transformed to Destination').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.queuingDuration}' as CopyActivity_TimeToFirstByte_SS,
'@{activity('Transformed to Destination').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.transferDuration}' as CopyActivity_TransferDuration_SS

SELECT '@{pipeline().DataFactory}' as DataFactoryName,
'@{pipeline().Pipeline}' as PipelineName,
'@{pipeline().RunId}' as RunID,
'@{item().SrcStoredProcedure}' as Source,
'@{item().DestEntity}' as Destination,
'@{pipeline().TriggerType}' as TriggerType,
'@{pipeline().TriggerId}' as TriggerID,
'@{pipeline().TriggerName}' as TriggerName,
'@{pipeline().TriggerTime}' as TriggerTime,
'@{activity('Source to Staging').output.rowsCopied}' as RowsCopied,
'@{activity('Source to Staging').output.rowsRead}' as RowsRead,
'@{activity('Source to Staging').output.usedParallelCopies}' as ParallelCopies,
'@{activity('Source to Staging').output.copyDuration}' as CopyDuration_SS,
'@{activity('Source to Staging').output.effectiveIntegrationRuntime}' as EffectiveIntegrationRuntime,
'@{activity('Source to Staging').output.executionDetails[0].source.type}' as SourceType,
'@{activity('Source to Staging').output.executionDetails[0].sink.type}' as SinkType,
'@{activity('Source to Staging').output.executionDetails[0].status}' as ExecutionStatus,
'@{activity('Source to Staging').output.executionDetails[0].start}' as CopyActivity_StartTime,
'@{utcnow()}' as CopyActivity_EndTime,
'@{activity('Source to Staging').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.queuingDuration}' as CopyActivity_QueuingDuration_SS,
'@{activity('Source to Staging').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.queuingDuration}' as CopyActivity_TimeToFirstByte_SS,
'@{activity('Source to Staging').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.transferDuration}' as CopyActivity_TransferDuration_SS

source.query:
<fetch>
	<entity name="stringmap">		
		
		<attribute name="attributename"/>		
		<attribute name="attributevalue"/>
		<attribute name="objecttypecode"/>
		<attribute name="value"/>

		<filter type="and">
			<condition attribute="attributename" operator="like" value="phg_%"/>
		</filter>
		
	</entity>
</fetch>
